verses.text: \w Therefore|strong="G1352"\w* thou \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w inexcusable|strong="G0379"\w*, \w O|strong="G5599"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, whosoever thou \w art|strong="G3956"\w* that \w judgest|strong="G2919"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w wherein|strong="G1722"\w* thou \w judgest|strong="G2919"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w*, thou \w condemnest|strong="G2632"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* thou that \w judgest|strong="G2919"\w* \w doest|strong="G4238"\w* the same \w things|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* we are \w sure|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w judgment|strong="G2917"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* \w against|strong="G1909"\w* them which \w commit|strong="G4238"\w* such \w things|strong="G5108"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* thinkest \w thou|strong="G3049"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*, \w O|strong="G5599"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, that \w judgest|strong="G2919"\w* them which \w do|strong="G4238"\w* such \w things|strong="G5108"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w doest|strong="G4160"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* shalt \w escape|strong="G1628"\w* the \w judgment|strong="G2917"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*?

\w Or|strong="G2228"\w* despisest \w thou|strong="G2706"\w* the \w riches|strong="G4149"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w goodness|strong="G5544"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w forbearance|strong="G0463"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w longsuffering|strong="G3115"\w*; not \w knowing|strong="G0050"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w goodness|strong="G5543"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w leadeth|strong="G0071"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w hardness|strong="G4643"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w impenitent|strong="G0279"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* treasurest \w up|strong="G2343"\w* unto \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* \w against|strong="G1722"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w revelation|strong="G0602"\w* of the righteous \w judgment|strong="G1341"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;
\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* will \w render|strong="G0591"\w* to every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w deeds|strong="G2041"\w*:

To \w them|strong="G3588"\w* who \w by|strong="G2596"\w* patient \w continuance|strong="G5281"\w* in \w well|strong="G0018"\w* \w doing|strong="G2041"\w* seek \w for|strong="G2212"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w immortality|strong="G0861"\w*, \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* unto \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that are \w contentious|strong="G2052"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* do not \w obey|strong="G0544"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w obey|strong="G3982"\w* \w unrighteousness|strong="G0093"\w*, \w indignation|strong="G2372"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w*,

\w Tribulation|strong="G2347"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w anguish|strong="G4730"\w*, \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w* of \w man|strong="G0444"\w* that \w doeth|strong="G2716"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*, of the \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w Gentile|strong="G1672"\w*;

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w honour|strong="G5092"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, to every \w man|strong="G3956"\w* that \w worketh|strong="G2038"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w*, to the \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w Gentile|strong="G1672"\w*:
\w For|strong="G1063"\w* there \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* respect of \w persons|strong="G4382"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* as many \w as|strong="G3745"\w* have \w sinned|strong="G0264"\w* without \w law|strong="G0460"\w* \w shall|strong="G0622"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w perish|strong="G0622"\w* without \w law|strong="G0460"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* as many \w as|strong="G3745"\w* have \w sinned|strong="G0264"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* shall be \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*;

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w hearers|strong="G0202"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \add are\add* \w just|strong="G1342"\w* \w before|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* the \w doers|strong="G4163"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* shall be \w justified|strong="G1344"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, which \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w do|strong="G4160"\w* by \w nature|strong="G5449"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* contained in the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w these|strong="G3778"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w are|strong="G1526"\w* a \w law|strong="G3551"\w* unto \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*:

\w Which|strong="G3748"\w* \w shew|strong="G1731"\w* the \w work|strong="G2041"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w written|strong="G1123"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* also bearing \w witness|strong="G4828"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add their\add* \w thoughts|strong="G3053"\w* the mean \w while|strong="G3342"\w* \w accusing|strong="G2723"\w* or \w else|strong="G2228"\w* \w excusing|strong="G0626"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*;)

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* shall \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* the \w secrets|strong="G2927"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="G1492"\w*, \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* art \w called|strong="G2028"\w* a \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w restest|strong="G1879"\w* in the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* makest thy \w boast|strong="G2744"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w knowest|strong="G1097"\w* \add his\add* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w approvest|strong="G1381"\w* the things that are more \w excellent|strong="G1308"\w*, being \w instructed|strong="G2727"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*;

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* art confident \w that|strong="G3982"\w* thou \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w* \w art|strong="G1511"\w* a \w guide|strong="G3595"\w* of the \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*, a \w light|strong="G5457"\w* of \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which are \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*,

An \w instructor|strong="G3810"\w* of the \w foolish|strong="G0878"\w*, a \w teacher|strong="G1320"\w* of \w babes|strong="G3516"\w*, which \w hast|strong="G2192"\w* the \w form|strong="G3446"\w* of \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="G3588"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* which \w teachest|strong="G1321"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w*, teachest \w thou|strong="G1321"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w*? thou that \w preachest|strong="G2784"\w* a man should \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w steal|strong="G2813"\w*, dost thou \w steal|strong="G2813"\w*?

Thou that \w sayest|strong="G3004"\w* a man should \w not|strong="G3361"\w* commit \w adultery|strong="G3431"\w*, dost thou commit \w adultery|strong="G3431"\w*? thou that \w abhorrest|strong="G0948"\w* \w idols|strong="G1497"\w*, dost thou commit \w sacrilege|strong="G2416"\w*?

Thou \w that|strong="G3739"\w* makest thy \w boast|strong="G2744"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w breaking|strong="G3847"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* dishonourest \w thou|strong="G0818"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* is \w blasphemed|strong="G0987"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \w verily|strong="G3303"\w* \w profiteth|strong="G5623"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* thou \w keep|strong="G4238"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* thou \w be|strong="G1510"\w* a \w breaker|strong="G3848"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* is \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* the \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w* \w keep|strong="G5442"\w* the \w righteousness|strong="G1345"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, shall \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w* be \w counted|strong="G3049"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w not|strong="G2919"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w* which is \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w nature|strong="G5449"\w*, if it \w fulfil|strong="G5055"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w letter|strong="G1121"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* dost \w transgress|strong="G3848"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* a \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, which is \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w outwardly|strong="G5318"\w*; \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \add is that\add* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*, which is \w outward|strong="G5318"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \add is\add* a \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, which is \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w inwardly|strong="G2927"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \add is that\add* of the \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \add and\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* in the \w letter|strong="G1121"\w*; \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w praise|strong="G1868"\w* \add is\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.
